title: almost constant 'attempting to reconnect'
body:
it has been doing this for the past two or 3 days now... now i have done everything from resetting my router, to making sure the port forwarding is correct, to reinstalling league, to doing a deep clean on my computer itself. No, it isnt my internet because this is the ONLY game out of the 6 other online games i play where it constantly screws me over with connection issues. hell i get 32 ping 99% of the time when playing this yet i still get this 'attempting to reconnect'.

some insight on this would be freaking lovely...

replies.body: Im having this exact same problem as well. Any fixes on this? Or is this a bug that far and few players are experiencing?

Your ping seems to be good, but something seems to be specifically blocking off your connection to the game server.  You've done a few steps already which are solid, but I also recommend going through every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I have done everything on that list now except for the DNS server where you change it to 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.8.4 cause i really dont want to mess with that, and I am still getting the 'attempting to reconnect' i even switched back to the 'Legacy' Client.

I still can play all my other games no problem. i can stream video at 1080p no interruptions.

soooo i honestly dont know what to do.
Did you ever manage to fix it? I am experiencing the same problem right now and I can confirm it is extremely annoying....
so oddly everything is working just fine now. dunno what the hell is goin on but its weird.
